messages.content: Haha I guess your students will have to learn enough English for you to be able to ask them to fix it for you.

I made the mistake, however, of saying my own language was Portuguese, just to see how it would be for the students, and now I can't change it to English! This is a problem because I don't actually speak Portuguese. That will teach me not to lie to the computer.
Cool! It does seem pretty popular, and I think it's pretty fun to use
I passed the website on to my students and discovered they already had the app!
Yeah, it's Duolingo (duolingo.com). I like the style they use, but I'll be curious what you think.
Hi Andy, so nice to see you at the lake! Could you tell me again the name of the program you were using to learn Spanish? Thanks, Mary
